metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2121 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
OFFIS DCMTK's (All versions prior to 3.6.7) has a NULL pointer dereferencevulnerability while processing DICOM files, which may result in adenial-of-service condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2121` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.1~20150924-5ubuntu0.1~esm1
libdcmtk5 - 3.6.1~20150924-5ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.1~20150924-5ubuntu0.1~esm1').
